name: Race One X
description:
Race One X

"What's behind you doesn't matter"

Bringing racing back to its core, Race One X is FULLY unlocked.



14 RACE TRACKS UNLOCKED AND READY TO RACE
(MORE THAN 500 KM OF RACING)

From the shortest track at just over 1 KM to the massive 22.7 KM track Längste Straße.


SHOW ME THE CARS
FAST AND NIMBLE

Yes it is true! We have cars. A selection of them ready for you to race around. Unlike other games, ALL of our cars are unlocked and ready to race for the get go.


ACHIEVEMENTS
WHAT'S THE CHALLENGE?

We've all played other games where you race, win, unlock, earn and buy cars. You then cough up REAL money to upgrade blah blah blah... We think it should be about the racing, all cars, all tracks. Just you and your personal best. You'll get a nice shiny achievement for racing that track. Racing is more then earning, it's winning.



Race One X The Real Racing Arcade/Simulation
